programme.title: Inspiring Love
programme.desc: Shy artist Isla is shocked when her painting is accidentally sold to charismatic salesman Mark, whose boss wants to comission Isla for a sculpture. Mark, hoping to impress his boss, talks Isla up and gets her to do the job, but there's one problem...Isla's never sculpted before. With Mark's encouragement, Isla's confidence blossoms and so does their love.

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Charlotte’s taking her chance in the big city. She just began working for the hottest romance site writing their hit weekly dating article, and her new best friend, Lila, is as fun as she is loyal. She also befriends a coffee barista, Liam, who shows her all the best spots in the city. But dating a new guy each week to write about is making her feel burned out. And when Liam develops feelings for her, Charlotte will need to decide whether her work is more important than her chance at love.

programme.title: It's a Fixer Upper
programme.desc: When The Dovers find they’re in financial jeopardy, the only answer is to sell the house Anne’s parent’s left her. But when no one wants to buy it, they decide the only way to get rid of the house is to fix it up.

programme.title: Love, Alaska
programme.desc: When two childhood friends are reunited through a generous inheritance that bestows far more on their broken hearts than they bargained for - a second chance at love.

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: Our Take on Love
programme.desc: When unlucky-in-love Isabella and filmmaker Blake find themselves planning a huge celebration in a mansion, neither knew what they'd find. They unexpectedly find a love and adventure they never knew could be true.

programme.title: Inspiring Love
programme.desc: Shy artist Isla is shocked when her painting is accidentally sold to charismatic salesman Mark, whose boss wants to comission Isla for a sculpture. Mark, hoping to impress his boss, talks Isla up and gets her to do the job, but there's one problem...Isla's never sculpted before. With Mark's encouragement, Isla's confidence blossoms and so does their love.

She also befriends a coffee barista, Liam, who shows her all the best spots in the city. But dating a new guy each week to write about is making her feel burned out. And when Liam develops feelings for her, Charlotte will need to decide whether her work is more important than her chance at love.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.desc: Elinor Dashwood is frustrated when her sister Marianne announces she will move in to her apartment. Marianne has little regard for the way Elinor does things, and the sisters butt heads. Lizzie Bennet begs for her friend, Emma Woodhouse, to try to keep her parents from getting a divorce, even though Emma is a divorce attorney. Lizzie meets Mr. Darcy, her latest--and most difficult--real estate client to please.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.desc: Emma is about to set up Elinor on a date when Elinor admits she got cornered into going out with Collin, her odd and overly forward neighbor. On the date, Elinor is subject to the most awkward dinner of all time, and learns that Collin is really setting his sights on Lizzie. Marianne gets down to creative tactics to find the perfect job for herself. Lizzie agrees to stick it out and be Darcy’s realtor, despite his arrogant ways.

programme.title: Finding Love In Sisters
programme.desc: When her mother dies, Esperanza returns to Sisters, Oregon and reunites with her sisters.
